channel.title: Web Development and Technology Blog | Fernando López | EFEELE
channel.description: Welcome to my blog, where I share my passion for frontend development, web design, and the latest technology trends.

item.title: Apache Kafka for Data Engineers — A Practical, No-Fluff Guide
item.description: Everything a data engineer needs to ship reliable streaming pipelines with Kafka: core concepts, topic design, delivery semantics, local setup, Python examples, and operating tips.
item.author: Mo

item.title: DataFlowX
item.description: An end-to-end data engineering pipeline: ingest → validate → transform → warehouse → dashboard, orchestrated with Airflow and dbt.
